attributes.action: Prime Minister School Academy "must be Invented"
attributes.additional_details:
We are tired of seeing incompetent ministers, who do not know what decisions to make, whether right or wrong, we must be prepared, having studied to give our country the best without going against others, it takes collaboration. ENOUGH INCOMPETENT MINISTERS.
I ask a university like Harvard, for example, to create a specialization to become head of a state, study 20 years before that and know what are the essential needs of a nation, from the past, for the present and for the future.
attributes.background:
Can a lawyer, a doctor, a finance man, an economist, a building contractor, a criminal be PM?

From 2050, do you want to be a Prime Minister, you go to Prime Minister School Academy, only people who are smarter and who pass a difficult test can be part of this school, to this new initiative!
